description.value: This U.S. industry comprises establishments primarily engaged in (1) weaving or braiding narrow fabrics in their final form or initially made in wider widths that are specially constructed for narrower widths and/or (2) making fabric-covered elastic yarn and thread. Establishments in this industry may weave only; weave and finish; or weave, finish, and further fabricate fabric products.

job_tasks.value: High risk job tasks associated with this industry: Cut and dry rayon filaments Grind, mix, or weigh dyes or apply dyes to textiles Repeatedly prepare, card, or spin natural vegetable fibers Use epoxy, isocyanate, or formaldehyde-resin adhesives, finishes, or sealants
